Ameesha’s 400 luxury bags include one worth Rs 70 lakh
Ameesha Patel, a true South Bombay girl, has an impressive collection of nearly 400 luxury bags, including Birkin and Bottega Veneta pieces worth crores. Filmmaker Farah Khan toured her collection, admiring its rarity and value, while Ameesha joked about her expensive hobby costing her a Mumbai penthouse.
Ameesha Patel’s 400 luxury bags include one worth Rs 70 lakh: “If I didn’t buy bags, I’d own a Mumbai penthouse” | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAmeesha Patel’s 400 luxury bags include one worth Rs 70 lakh: “If I didn’t buy bags, I’d own a Mumbai penthouse”TrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaAmeesha Patel’s 400 luxury bags include one worth Rs 70 lakh: “If I didn’t buy bags, I’d own a Mumbai penthouse”TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 18, 2025, 18:08 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeAmeesha Patel, a true South Bombay girl, has an impressive collection of nearly 400 luxury bags, including Birkin and Bottega Veneta pieces worth crores. Filmmaker Farah Khan toured her collection, admiring its rarity and value, while Ameesha joked about her expensive hobby costing her a Mumbai penthouse. Ameesha Patel, a true South Bombay girl, has an impressive collection of nearly 400 luxury bags, including Birkin and Bottega Veneta pieces worth crores. Filmmaker Farah Khan toured her collection, admiring its rarity and value, while Ameesha joked about her expensive hobby costing her a Mumbai penthouse. Before making her debut in ‘Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai’, Ameesha Patel was already known as a true South Bombay girl, a fact reflected in her impressive handbag collection. Coming from a family with strong roots in business and politics, she began amassing designer bags at just 12 years old. Today, her collection boasts nearly 400 bags, each valued in lakhs of rupees. Recently, filmmaker and choreographer Farah Khan toured Ameesha’s home and shared a sneak peek of this stunning assortment.Farah Khan is amazed by Ameesha’s extensive collectionAt the start of the vlog, Farah expressed her amazement, saying, “I have never seen Ameesha repeat her bag. She must have the maximum number of designer bags in the industry.” Ameesha then shared that her collection includes around 300 to 400 luxury bags, in addition to several clutches and belt bags. Alongside handbags, she is also passionate about collecting luxury watches.Ameesha Patel Returns: Casual Look, Classic Charm In JuhuBirkin bags are stored in an organized cupboardFarah indicated a cupboard and remarked, “This cupboard is filled with Ameesha’s Birkin bags.” Considered one of the most prestigious brands globally, a Birkin bag can be priced as high as Rs 2-3 crore.Detailed inventory keeps track of her collectionInside the cupboard, the actor has neatly placed a detailed list that organizes the bags by each shelf. One section of the list reads: “Shelf 7: Hermes Yellow Evelyn, Hermes Baby Pink Evelyn, Hermes Fuschia Pink Evelyn, Hermes Orange Evelyn, Hermes Powder Blue Evelyn, Hermes Mini Red Evelyn, Hermes Mini White Evelyn, Dior Denim Saddle Bag, Fendi Phone Case, LV Phone Case.”Saint Laurent bag captivates Farah KhanThe actress carefully took out a Saint Laurent bag from its protective cover to show Farah. Seeing it, the filmmaker was visibly impressed and sighed, “This is a bag I have wanted for so long ever and ever but it is…” before making a facial expression that hinted it was beyond her budget.Rare Bottega Veneta bags steal the spotlightNext, they chose a bag from Bottega Veneta. As Farah unwrapped it, she told the viewers, “This is one of the most expensive brands in the world: Bottega Veneta.” She revealed an orange bag, commenting, “This is a rare one I am seeing.” Ameesha chimed in, “This is a little traditional colour.” Farah agreed, “Yeah, exactly why I have never even seen it.” Then Ameesha showcased another bag from the same brand and style in black, saying, “This is a little classic, this is Black.” With a smile, Ameesha joked, “If I didn’t have a habit of collecting bags, I would have been owning a penthouse in Mumbai,” referring to the high value of her collection.Playful banter about marriage and bagsNext, she revealed another bag from Bottega Veneta. Farah couldn’t help but joke, “I think you should marry Karan Johar.” Ameesha responded, “I think so too. We want to be single so it is an ideal relationship.” As Ameesha displayed her Andiamo Large Tote, Farah admired it as “gorgeous” and teased, “Don’t show this to Dilip, he will simply use it to buy vegetables.” Ameesha then laughed, explaining how people often poke fun at her for carrying such big bags. “They say, ‘These bags are bigger and heavier than you, so you use them for veggies only,’” she shared. Farah agreed, “This is very heavy.” Ameesha added, “Yeah, and it gets heavier when I add stuff in it.” The price tag on this bag is upwards of ₹5,80,000."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Honey Singh's weight loss leaves fans concerned, he responds
Honey Singh's recent weight loss of 17 kilos in a month, achieved through a strict diet and workout plan, has sparked mixed reactions from fans. While some express concern over his drastically different appearance, others praise his dedication to fitness. Singh humorously addressed the concerns, attributing his transformation to hard work, while his trainer revealed details of his intense regime.
Honey Singh's drastic weight loss leaves fans concerned, the singer gives a witty response: 'Working out hard for...' - WATCH VIDEO | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodHoney Singh's drastic weight loss leaves fans concerned, the singer gives a witty response: 'Working out hard for...' - WATCH VIDEOTrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaHoney Singh's drastic weight loss leaves fans concerned, the singer gives a witty response: 'Working out hard for...' - WATCH VIDEOTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 18, 2025, 16:31 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeHoney Singh's recent weight loss of 17 kilos in a month, achieved through a strict diet and workout plan, has sparked mixed reactions from fans. While some express concern over his drastically different appearance, others praise his dedication to fitness. Singh humorously addressed the concerns, attributing his transformation to hard work, while his trainer revealed details of his intense regime.  Rapper-singer Honey Singh has undergone a major physical transformation, but it has also left fans divided. His fitness trainer Arun Kumar recently revealed that the artist shed 17 kilos in just a month through a strict workout plan and diet. However, Singh’s latest pictures triggered concern among followers, with many pointing out that he looks drastically different.One Instagram user even shared a video comparing Honey’s glamorous looks from the past two years with his present-day appearance. The fan wrote, “I don’t know why no one has noticed it yet, but something has happened to Honey Singh. For the past two years, he was looking so glamorous, but in some of his recent posts and stories, it seems like something has happened to his nose. Honey Singh goes to the gym every day, but his body seems to be shrinking. I feel like something has happened again in his life that he isn’t telling anyone about.”Music Scandal Erupts! Honey Singh & Karan Aujla in HOT WATER Over ‘Offensive’ LyricsNot the one to shy away from humour, Honey responded in style: “Kuch nahi hua manhoos (Nothing happened, unlucky one 😂). I am working out hard for glorious days.” His quirky reply instantly won the internet. Fans praised his wit with comments like, “Kya jawab diya hai (What an answer),” and “Bomb paaji, good reply.” Another cheekily remarked, “You look much better than Badshah.”Honey Singh's trainer had spoken about his fitness regime in a conversation with Aaj Tak and revealed details behind Honey’s dramatic weight loss journey. According to him, the singer went from 95 kg to 77 kg in a month by following a meticulously designed meal plan, intense training, and a special green metabolism-boosting juice. He clarified that Singh’s diet was completely natural, with around 60 grams of protein daily from sources like chicken and vegetables."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Big Clash, Small Payoff: No one’s a winner !
Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' and Hrithik Roshan's 'War 2' faced off, but both films underperformed despite strong openings. 'Coolie' suffered from a weak screenplay and recycled tropes, while 'War 2' lacked a gripping emotional core. The clash highlighted the importance of storytelling over hype, leaving both films bruised at the box office.
Big Clash, Small Payoff: No one’s a winner ! | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodBig Clash, Small Payoff: No one’s a winner !TrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaBig Clash, Small Payoff: No one’s a winner !TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 18, 2025, 13:53 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeRajinikanth's 'Coolie' and Hrithik Roshan's 'War 2' faced off, but both films underperformed despite strong openings. 'Coolie' suffered from a weak screenplay and recycled tropes, while 'War 2' lacked a gripping emotional core. The clash highlighted the importance of storytelling over hype, leaving both films bruised at the box office. Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' and Hrithik Roshan's 'War 2' faced off, but both films underperformed despite strong openings. 'Coolie' suffered from a weak screenplay and recycled tropes, while 'War 2' lacked a gripping emotional core. The clash highlighted the importance of storytelling over hype, leaving both films bruised at the box office. When the release dates of Rajinikanth’s Coolie and Hrithik Roshan’s War 2 were locked for the same extended weekend, trade analysts, exhibitors, and fans braced themselves for what was billed as the “clash of the year.” The two films carried enormous weight on their shoulders: Coolie promised to be another mass masala entertainer led by the Rajinikanth himself collaborating with hit machine Lokesh Kanagaraj while War 2 was touted as Bollywood’s big-ticket spy-universe spectacle headlined by Hrithik Roshan with Jr NTR joining him to provide the south push.Yet, four days after their release, the numbers tell a different story. Both films have managed strong openings but are nowhere near the benchmarks their makers and fans had hoped for. The Numbers So FarIn India, Coolie collected Rs 65 crore on Day 1 (Thursday), primarily driven by Tamil Nadu and Telugu markets. Day 2 dropped to Rs 54.75 crore, followed by Rs 39.5 crore on Saturday and Rs 35 crore on Sunday. That brings its four-day total to aroundRs 194.25 crore net across languages.PollWhich film do you think had a stronger opening at the box office?CoolieWar 2War 2, on the other hand, opened lower with Rs 52 crore on Day 1. It managed to inch higher on Day 2 with Rs 57.35 crore, before sliding sharply to Rs 33.25 crore on Saturday andRs 31 crore (early estimates) on Sunday. Its four-day total stands atRs 173.6 crore net across languages with Hindi version contributing over Rs 125 crore.Overseas, the story isn’t drastically different. In North America, Coolie minted around USD 6 million in four days, while War 2 collected USD 3 million. For two films that were marketed as pan-India and global tentpoles, these numbers, while healthy in isolation, do not reflect the earth-shattering dominance one would expect from such heavyweight titles.The real problem both films face isn’t the clash , it is the content itself.Rajinikanth’s Coolie was designed as a throwback to the larger-than-life masala entertainers that made him a superstar. The trailers promised punch dialogues, exaggerated action, and whistle-worthy swagger. The first day’s collections indicated that fans turned out in droves.But as the weekend wore on, the word of mouth began to dip. Audiences complained about a weak screenplay, recycled tropes, and lack of emotional depth. Rajinikanth’s charisma remained intact, but the film offered little beyond his screen presence. Younger audiences, especially in metros, found the film dated, while family audiences felt the emotional core was missing.On the other hand, War 2 had the baggage of carrying forward the Spy Universe after Pathaan and Tiger. Expectations were sky-high, especially with Hrithik Roshan reprising his Kabir role and NTR Jr joining as the antagonist. The fans called out the film for its flimsy writing, incoherent arcs,not up to the mark VFX and a predictable storyline.The problem here wasn’t the lack of spectacle but the absence of a gripping emotional anchor. The film felt like a series of set pieces stitched together rather than a cohesive narrative.When two big-ticket films release on the same day, cannibalization is inevitable. Screens get divided, shows overlap, and audiences—especially in multiplexes—are forced to choose one over the other.In this case, Coolie dominated the South Indian markets, while War 2 enjoyed better traction in North India.The Burden of ExpectationBoth films also became victims of their own hype.Coolie was marketed as Rajinikanth’s grand return after the super success of JailerThe teaser broke records, the songs trended across social media, and fan clubs went all out with promotions. But when the film delivered more of the same old formula, audiences felt shortchanged.War 2, meanwhile, was positioned as a chapter in India’s first “spy universe.” The inclusion of NTR Jr was supposed to attract Southern audiences, while Hrithik’s return was meant to fuel nationwide frenzy. However, the film’s writing simply didn’t match the monumental expectations it carried.Mixed Word of MouthAnother critical factor has been the mixed word of mouth.Coolie has strong appeal among Rajinikanth loyalists, ensuring single-screen crowds remain energetic, but urban audiences are lukewarm.War 2 is attracting footfalls for its action spectacle, but its inconsistent pacing is putting off repeat viewership.The Road AheadFor Coolie, the hope lies in South Indian markets, where Rajinikanth’s pull remains unmatched. The film may stabilize at lower levels but still post healthy lifetime numbers due to fan loyalty.For War 2, the Hindi belt will be crucial. If word of mouth steadies and the weekday drops aren’t too steep, the film can still salvage its run, though crossing Rs 300 crore net in India a figure once expected now looks improbable despite having no new films releasing till 29th August.In the end, the much-hyped Coolie vs War 2 clash has proven to be a lose-lose situation. Instead of creating fireworks at the box office, the battle has highlighted the fragility of films that lean too heavily on hype and star power while neglecting storytelling.Both Rajinikanth and Hrithik Roshan remain massive crowd-pullers, and both films will recover costs thanks to pre-sales, digital, and satellite deals. But in terms of theatrical impact, neither will go down as the historic blockbuster their makers envisioned. Sometimes, two giants colliding doesn’t create a spectacle; it simply leaves both bruised."Get the latest news updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Apoorva Mukhija's ex-boyfriend accuses her of cheating
Apoorva Mukhija, fresh from 'The Traitors,' faces public fallout as Sufi Motiwala ends their friendship, citing a lack of support against online trolls. Adding to the drama, ex-boyfriend Utsav Dahiya accuses Apoorva of cheating and using their relationship for content.
Apoorva Mukhija's ex-boyfriend accuses her of cheating and bullying: 'Ab agar koi aur bakwaas kari...' | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodApoorva Mukhija's ex-boyfriend accuses her of cheating and bullying: 'Ab agar koi aur bakwaas kari...'TrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaApoorva Mukhija's ex-boyfriend accuses her of cheating and bullying: 'Ab agar koi aur bakwaas kari...'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 18, 2025, 18:28 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeApoorva Mukhija, fresh from 'The Traitors,' faces public fallout as Sufi Motiwala ends their friendship, citing a lack of support against online trolls. Adding to the drama, ex-boyfriend Utsav Dahiya accuses Apoorva of cheating and using their relationship for content.  After the India’s Got Latent controversy settled, influencer Apoorva Mukhija found herself in the spotlight once again with her stint on Karan Johar’s reality show The Traitors. On the show, she was often discussed alongside fellow content creator Sufi Motiwala. But now, Sufi has publicly declared that he and Apoorva are no longer friends, citing her lack of support when he was targeted by trolls from her audience.In an Instagram story, Sufi clarified, “No more lies. I’ve received a lot of texts saying that I’ve taken clout from Apoorva and I’ve left her. I’ve literally never collaborated on a reel with her and have been on her YouTube twice, both of which were her content pieces entirely. So no I’m not sorry I didn’t use her for clout (incase u forgot we were on the same show without knowing each other I don’t need her clout) I wanted to be friends with Apoorva not the rebel kid when there was no accountability constantly for how I was being treated I distanced myself.”Uorfi Javed vs Apoorva Mukhija: ‘The Traitors’ Reality Show Fight Gets UGLYWhile Sufi distanced himself, Apoorva’s ex-boyfriend Utsav Dahiya also took to Instagram with a sharp takedown of the influencer. In a recent post, Utsav accused her of cheating, even sharing a song in which he called her out, alleging that she wanted to reconcile purely for “content.” He also claimed that Apoorva used the word “ghatiya” for him only to boost social media engagement.Part of his caption read: “Ab agar koi aur bakwaas kari toh main seedha receipts nikalunga. Never try to gain sympathy by fabricating lies or pushing false narratives just to make content and assassinate someone’s character online. Having a big following doesn’t give you the right to bully your way by rage-baiting your audience and unleashing them on others.”Utsav further alleged that Apoorva and her team dismissed his concerns when he was being trolled due to her accusations: “When I was being falsely painted as a cheat and an abuser because of things you said, I reached out to you and your agency, hoping to find a way to deal with the hate. Instead, I was told, ‘You’re a nobody, you should be happy you got to date her.’ So here’s a message from that ‘nobody’: you tried your level best (and I won’t lie, it wasn’t easy), but I’m still here, still standing. That should tell you something: your big numbers only matter on an app. There’s a real and much bigger world outside, beyond lies and kalesh.”He concluded by saying, "Truth doesn't need 'followers', it stands on its own. Toh tum chalao apna ghar kalesh se, but kisi ke baare mein jhoot bolna band karo. Baki logo ko life mein dhanke kaam karne do. Grow up, kid. (and here's a rhyme for you that might be more up your speed .... in case it helps)" With his caption, he sang a song dedicated to her which also hinted at their story. Apoorva and Utsav had announced their breakup earlier this year in January. Since then, she has repeatedly hinted at him in her content, accusing him of cheating and abuse without taking his name directly. In his latest post too, Utsav avoided naming her, but the message left little doubt for followers about whom he was addressing."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. 'Mahavatar Parshuram' to start rolling in November
Following the triumph of 'Mahavatar Narsimha,' director Ashwin Kumar is already immersed in pre-production for 'Mahavatar Parashuram.' Kumar aims to commence filming within three months, targeting November, and promises an unprecedented cinematic experience. He also revealed plans for two live-action films, including a horror project and one based on Ardhanarishvara.
Director Ashwin Kumar CONFIRMS 'Mahavatar Parshuram' to start rolling in November; reveals he is planning two live-action movies - Deets Inside | Telugu Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenttelugumoviesDirector Ashwin Kumar CONFIRMS 'Mahavatar Parshuram' to start rolling in November; reveals he is planning two live-action movies - Deets InsideTrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaDirector Ashwin Kumar CONFIRMS 'Mahavatar Parshuram' to start rolling in November; reveals he is planning two live-action movies - Deets InsideTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 18, 2025, 18:29 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollowing the triumph of 'Mahavatar Narsimha,' director Ashwin Kumar is already immersed in pre-production for 'Mahavatar Parashuram.' Kumar aims to commence filming within three months, targeting November, and promises an unprecedented cinematic experience. He also revealed plans for two live-action films, including a horror project and one based on Ardhanarishvara.  At the end of 'Mahavatar Narsimha' we get introduced to the films that are lined up in the Mahavatar Universe. The next project in the franchise will be 'Mahavatar Parashuram.' And now, the film's director, Ashwin Kumar, has shared the latest update on the next movie. He revealed that it is already in the pre-production stage. Here's what the filmmaker said about his next outing.Ashwin Kumar shares a MAJOR update on 'Mahavatar Parashuram'After the massive success of 'Mahavatar Narsimha,' director Ashwin Kumar is ready for his next venture in the franchise, 'Mahavatar Parashuram.' In an interview with India Today, the filmmaker shared that the project is already in the pre-production phase and added that it will be an experience that the audience has never witnessed on screen.From a ₹15-cr budget to ₹200-cr triumph: How Mahavatar Narsimha became India’s animated kingCalling Lord Parashuram the "real fountainhead of the antihero" and someone who stood up against the system to make it right. He said, "That’s a very powerful story, and we’re aiming to go on floors within the next three months, mostly by November."Ashwin Kumar on the success of 'Mahavatar Narsimha'Talking about the success of the film, Ashwin Kumar stated that seeing the love his film was getting "definitely" boosted his confidence. It has made him feel that he should keep doing "things like this."Ashwin Kumar talks about next films in the Mahavatar Cinematic UniverseAshwin Kumar added, "Pressure is only there if I don’t know what I’m doing—but I already know the next seven films I want to make, so it’s very clear in my head."The director went on to reveal that not all of the films that were announced would be animated. He shared that most of them would be animated, but "I’m also planning two live-action films—one is a horror project, and the other is based on the concept of Ardhanarishvara."'Mahavatar Narsimha', the first film of the franchise, has crossed Rs 200 crore mark at the box office globally."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Priyanka on 16 years of 'Kaminey': 'Shahid was sensational'
Priyanka Chopra celebrated 16 years of 'Kaminey', recalling it as a turning point in her career. She shared her experience of being cast while filming 'Dostana' and praised director Vishal Bhardwaj's influence on her approach to acting. Chopra also lauded Shahid Kapoor's performance and Amol Gupte's unforgettable role in the film set against the Mumbai underworld.
Priyanka Chopra celebrates 16 years of 'Kaminey,' calling it 'turning point' in her career: 'Shahid Kapoor was sensational' | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodPriyanka Chopra celebrates 16 years of 'Kaminey,' calling it 'turning point' in her career: 'Shahid Kapoor was sensational'TrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaPriyanka Chopra celebrates 16 years of 'Kaminey,' calling it 'turning point' in her career: 'Shahid Kapoor was sensational'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 18, 2025, 16:30 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargePriyanka Chopra celebrated 16 years of 'Kaminey', recalling it as a turning point in her career. She shared her experience of being cast while filming 'Dostana' and praised director Vishal Bhardwaj's influence on her approach to acting. Chopra also lauded Shahid Kapoor's performance and Amol Gupte's unforgettable role in the film set against the Mumbai underworld.  Priyanka Chopra celebrates 16 years of 'Kaminey' with a long note on social media. In the caption of her post, she expressed how the film was a turning point in her career. She even praised her co-star Shahid Kapoor, who was the male lead of the movie.Let's take a look at what the actress shared about her film.Priyanka Chopra reminisces about 'Kaminey': 'Learned so much from the master—Vishal BhardwajPriyanka Chopra featured as the female lead of Vishal Bhardwaj's acclaimed film, 'Kaminey,' starring Shahid Kapoor. As the film turned 16 since its release, the actress took to Instagram to celebrate the occasion. In a long note, she revealed what went on behind the scenes before she bagged the role of Sweety Bhope.Priyanka Chopra shares adorable family moments—Malti crashes Jonas Brothers rehearsalSharing the stills from the film, the actress stated that she was approached for the role while she was shooting for 'Dostana' in Miami. She wrote, "Sweety Bhope. I was filming for Dostana in Miami, Florida, with @tarun_mansukhani directing and @bachchan and @thejohnabraham starring. One cool evening after we wrapped shoot, I saw a missed call from Vishal Bhardwaj. What?? I had wanted to work with him forever and never thought he would cast me because of my 'commercial' image at the time."Elaborating further, she added, "He said he'd like to come see me, and he did. To Miami. I remember him telling me the story, and I said, 'Well, she has approximately 8 scenes.' And he said, 'With us working on it, it will end up being so much more. Trust me.' And I did. He promised he would make something incredible for me after this in appreciation for doing the part."Priyanka expressed that she was always "greedy to work with him." The global diva further shared, "#Kaminey remains a turning point in my career. I learned so much from the master @vishalbhardwaj, how to research, prepare, and then surrender to the part."Priyanka praises her 'Kaminey' co-star Shahid KapoorIn the same caption, the actress stated that Shahid Kapoor was "sensational" in the dual roles he played. Further, she showered love on actor-filmmaker Amol Gupte and wrote, "#AmolGupte was unforgettable."Concluding her long note, she added, "I also met @mubinarattonsey for the first time on this set. Those were the times. 16 years ago! Thought I'd share the experience. Have any of you watched it?"More about 'Kaminey'The film tells a story about twins (played by Shahid Kapoor) and their rivalry. One character was with a lisp, while the other had a stutter. The movie is set against the backdrop of the Mumbai underworld. The film was released on August 14, 2009 and was a box office hit."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. We explore the intersections of entertainment with society, politics, and everyday life.Read MoreEnd of ArticleFollow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   PreviousAn unspoken language: Species that 'Coolie' vs 'War 2': Rajinikanth's film leads Jr NTR-Hrithik Roshan's film
Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' has gained a slight advantage over 'War 2' at the box office, particularly in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana. 'Coolie' earned Rs 12 crore in the Nizam region over its opening weekend, surpassing 'War 2' which collected around Rs 10 crore. All India collections also show 'Coolie' leading with Rs 194.25 crore, while 'War 2' amassed Rs 173.60 crore.
'Coolie' vs 'War 2' Box office collection day 4: Rajinikanth's starrer edges past Jr NTR-Hrithik Roshan's film in Nizam | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenttelugumovies'Coolie' vs 'War 2' Box office collection: Rajinikanth's starrer edges past Jr NTR-Hrithik Roshan's film in NizamTrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan Thoogudeepa'Coolie' vs 'War 2' Box office collection: Rajinikanth's starrer edges past Jr NTR-Hrithik Roshan's film in NizamTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 18, 2025, 16:32 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeRajinikanth's 'Coolie' has gained a slight advantage over 'War 2' at the box office, particularly in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana. 'Coolie' earned Rs 12 crore in the Nizam region over its opening weekend, surpassing 'War 2' which collected around Rs 10 crore. All India collections also show 'Coolie' leading with Rs 194.25 crore, while 'War 2' amassed Rs 173.60 crore. Picture Credit: X Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' is enjoying a slight edge at the box office over 'War 2', particularly in the crucial Andhra Pradesh and Telangana markets. The Lokesh Kanagaraj directorial, which was released alongside the Hrithik Roshan–Jr NTR starrer, has emerged as the stronger contender in the Nizam region over its opening weekend.Extended weekend numbers in NizamAs per a report by 123Telugu, the film grossed an impressive Rs 1.6 crore on Sunday, its fourth day in theaters. This pushed the extended weekend total to a solid Rs 12 crore from all languages in Nizam alone. While Sunday's earnings dipped slightly compared to Saturday's Rs 2.65 crore share, the film's overall performance shows its clear hold over audiences.Hrithik calls Rajinikanth his 'first teacher' ahead of 'War 2' vs 'Coolie' clash'War 2' yet to match the paceOn the other hand, 'War 2', one of Bollywood’s most ambitious action spectacles featuring Hrithik Roshan and Jr NTR, has struggled to keep up in the region. Its four-day Nizam collection has been pegged at around Rs 10 crore, falling short of Rajinikanth's box office numbers. With both films now stepping into the working week, it remains to be seen whether 'Coolie' can maintain its strong momentum or if 'War 2' will make a late push.See More:'Coolie' box office collection day 5 (Live): Rajinikanth starrer holds strong, to surpass Rs 200 crore in IndiaAll-India collectionsAccording to trade analyst Sacnilk, the box office collections for the 2025 films 'Coolie' and 'War 2' reveal a strong showing for both, with 'Coolie' leading the race.'Coolie,' netted approximately Rs 194.25 crore in India, with day-wise earnings of Rs 65 crore on Day 1, Rs 54.75 crore on Day 2, Rs 39.5 crore on Day 3, and Rs 34 crore on Day 4. Meanwhile, 'War 2' performed well, it faced mixed reviews and comparatively slower growth in overall box office collections than 'Coolie.' Meanwhile, 'War 2', raked in Rs 52 crore on its first day. The film picked up further on Friday, collecting Rs 57.35 crore. However, Saturday saw a sharp dip with earnings of Rs 33.25 crore. On Sunday, the film added another Rs 31 crore as per early estimates. With this, War 2 has amassed an impressive total of Rs 173.60 crore in its four-day extended weekend.DISCLAIMER: The box office numbers in this article are compiled from our proprietary sources and diverse public data. While we strive for accuracy, all figures are approximate unless explicitly mentioned, offering a fair representation of the project's box office performance. We are open to feedback and suggestions on toientertainment@timesinternet.in.See More:'War 2' box office collection day 5 (LIVE): The Hrithik Roshan, Jr NTR starrer starts slow has a slow start on Monday after a long weekend"Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. 'Coolie' box office: Rajinikanth film nears Rs 200 crore in India
Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' released on August 14. The film sees massive fan celebrations. 'Coolie' earns ₹193.25 crore in its first four days. Day five pushes the total to ₹196.55 crore. The movie features Nagarjuna Akkineni, Aamir Khan, and others. Anirudh Ravichander composed the music. The action drama tells a revenge story. The film maintains good weekday collections.
Coolie Full Movie Collection: 'Coolie' box office collection day 5 (Live): Rajinikanth starrer holds strong, to surpass Rs 200 crore in India | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenttamilmovies'Coolie' box office collection day 5 (Live): Rajinikanth starrer holds strong, to surpass Rs 200 crore in IndiaTrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan Thoogudeepa'Coolie' box office collection day 5 (Live): Rajinikanth starrer holds strong, to surpass Rs 200 crore in IndiaTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 18, 2025, 14:54 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeRajinikanth's 'Coolie' released on August 14. The film sees massive fan celebrations. 'Coolie' earns ₹193.25 crore in its first four days. Day five pushes the total to ₹196.55 crore. The movie features Nagarjuna Akkineni, Aamir Khan, and others. Anirudh Ravichander composed the music. The action drama tells a revenge story. The film maintains good weekday collections.  Superstar Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' hit the theatres on August 14. Fans thronged the theatres in large numbers from the very first show.It was like a festival with the fans celebrating, crackers, and milk pouring everywhere. Expectations were high for ‘Coolie’ as it was Rajinikanth’s 50th anniversary film. Directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, the film has received decent reviews from critics and fans alike and has achieved huge box office collections upon release.Coolie Movie Review‘Coolie’ nets ₹193.25 crore in first four days'Coolie' has earned ₹193.25 crore in India net collection in the first four days of its release as per Sacnilk.The film collected ₹65 crore on the first day alone, Thursday. The Tamil version collected the most, earning ₹44.5 crore. The Hindi version collected ₹4.5 crore, Telugu ₹15.5 crore, and Kannada ₹0.5 crore. Although the second day collection decreased slightly, the film earned ₹54.75 crore. The film collected ₹39.5 crore on the third day, Saturday, and ₹34 crore on the fourth day, Sunday, making it a huge box office success in its first weekend.Day 5 collection pushes total to ₹196.55 croreOn its fifth day, Monday (Aug 18), 'Coolie' earned around ₹4.3 crore in India net collection. This brings the total India net collection to ₹196.55 crore. The film has maintained good collections even on weekdays, and fans are confident that 'Coolie' will set a record in the long run. The film is expected to cross ₹200 crore by the end of the day. If it continues at this pace, there is a good chance that ‘Coolie’ will also set a huge record at the global box office.Star-studded cast and Anirudh’s music power the filmNagarjuna Akkineni, Aamir Khan, Sathyaraj, Shruti Haasan, Soubin Shahir, Rachita Ram, and Upendra, among others play crucial roles in 'Coolie', and the film has music composed by Anirudh Ravichander. The action drama narrates a revenge story, and the highly anticipated film failed to surprise fans with its story and screenplay. Leonardo and Vittoria share romantic kiss on yacht
Leonardo DiCaprio and Vittoria Ceretti enjoyed a romantic getaway. They were seen on a yacht off Formentera, Spain. The couple shared a kiss and relaxed on board. They have been linked since August 2023. Earlier this summer, they attended Jeff Bezos' wedding celebrations. Ceretti spoke about the pressures of dating someone famous. The couple has kept their relationship mostly private.
Leonardo DiCaprio shares romantic kiss with 27-year-old model Vittoria Ceretti during a yacht outing in Spain | English Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmentenglishhollywoodLeonardo DiCaprio shares romantic kiss with 27-year-old model Vittoria Ceretti during a yacht outing in SpainTrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaLeonardo DiCaprio shares romantic kiss with 27-year-old model Vittoria Ceretti during a yacht outing in SpainTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in /  Aug 18, 2025, 13:09 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeLeonardo DiCaprio and Vittoria Ceretti enjoyed a romantic getaway. They were seen on a yacht off Formentera, Spain. The couple shared a kiss and relaxed on board. They have been linked since August 2023. Earlier this summer, they attended Jeff Bezos' wedding celebrations. Ceretti spoke about the pressures of dating someone famous. The couple has kept their relationship mostly private.  Oscar-winning actor Leonardo DiCaprio, 50, and Italian model Vittoria Ceretti, 27, were spotted enjoying a romantic yacht trip off the coast of Formentera, Spain. On Friday, August 15, the pair shared a kiss while relaxing on board, giving fans a rare glimpse of their private romance. Sun, sea and a little PDAAccording to the pictures and videos published by Daily Mail, the couple clearly made the most of their Mediterranean getaway. They lounged on the yacht, took dips in the sparkling blue waters, and mingled with friends on board. At one sweet moment, Ceretti placed her hand on DiCaprio’s back as they climbed the yacht stairs together. A relaxed day in the sun turned into a picture-perfect PDA moment.Rare public appearance sparks excitementThough linked since August 2023, DiCaprio and Ceretti are rarely seen together in public. Their yacht outing gave fans a rare and intimate look at a love that has stayed mostly under wraps.Jet-setting lovebirdsThe couple seems to share a love for travel and luxury trips. Earlier this summer, they were spotted at Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez’s wedding celebrations in Venice. On June 26, they were photographed leaving the Gritti Palace Hotel before the wedding welcome party. DiCaprio was effortlessly sharp in a dark suit and cap, while Ceretti looked chic in a long neutral dress with stitching details, a stylish updo, and a nude clutch bag.Ceretti opens up about high-profile loveEarlier this year, Ceretti spoke for the first time about dating someone famous in Vogue France. While she didn’t name DiCaprio directly, the magazine called him a “very, very famous actor.”The model said they first met in Milan but didn’t share more details. She also reflected on the pressures of dating in the spotlight. “As soon as you're in a relationship with someone who has a larger following than you, you become 'girlfriend of', or 'boyfriend of,' for that matter. And that can be extremely annoying,” she told Vogue France.Labels can be limitingCeretti added, “Suddenly, people are talking about you as so-and-so's girlfriend who was so-and-so's ex. So, it's not nice to think that you can't love whoever you want, because of the labels people need to stick on you.”Yet, she said love can rise above all the noise. “If what you're experiencing is real, if you know you love each other, then there's no reason to be alarmed. Because love protects and gives confidence."Since their romance became public, DiCaprio and Ceretti have kept things mostly private but have been spotted together at a few events and trips. The Formentera yacht getaway gave fans a sun-soaked, love-filled glimpse into their relationship"Get the latest news updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Victoria Canal accuses a ‘powerful’ man of sexual abuse
Victoria Canal, the Spanish-American singer-songwriter, bravely disclosed being groomed and abused by a powerful, older man early in her career, enduring over a year of manipulation and silence. Despite this, she has achieved significant success, including an Ivor Novello Award, while openly addressing body image and mental health. Canal's resilience shines through her music and advocacy.
Victoria Canal, Spanish-American singer and songwriter, accuses a ‘powerful’ man of sexual abuse in emotional Instagram post: Read here | English Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardsNewsentertainmentenglishmusicVictoria Canal, Spanish-American singer and songwriter, accuses a ‘powerful’ man of sexual abuse in emotional Instagram post: Read hereTrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaVictoria Canal, Spanish-American singer and songwriter, accuses a ‘powerful’ man of sexual abuse in emotional Instagram post: Read hereTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 18, 2025, 18:51 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeVictoria Canal, the Spanish-American singer-songwriter, bravely disclosed being groomed and abused by a powerful, older man early in her career, enduring over a year of manipulation and silence. Despite this, she has achieved significant success, including an Ivor Novello Award, while openly addressing body image and mental health. Canal's resilience shines through her music and advocacy.  TRIGGER WARNING: This article includes references to sexual abuseVictoria Canal, a Spanish-American singer and songwriter, has courageously revealed that she was groomed and abused by a “very powerful, decades-older man” early in her career. In a heartfelt Instagram post, she shared how the abuse lasted over a year and how she was manipulated into silence, being told that speaking out would end her career before it had even begun.Victoria Canal UNMASKS ‘POWERFUL’ ABUSER; 'June Baby' Star Exposes Grooming HorrorBeyond this revelation, Canal has been open about her life and challenges. Born with a congenital condition, she refuses to be defined by it. According to a Prime Timer report, Canal was born without the lower half of her right arm. She has compared it to something as ordinary as having “an unlucky-shaped nose” and insists she does not want to be boxed as ‘the one-armed singer’ like Stevie Wonder, who is not solely defined by blindness.Her unique perspective has shaped her music. Canal learned to play piano without her right hand, developing special chord voicings and creative techniques that are central to her songwriting.Global upbringing shaped her early careerAs reported by Hindustan Times, she was born in Munich and raised across the globe. Canal often communicated online due to her family’s nomadic lifestyle. Her breakthrough came through Instagram, where short clips of her performances caught the attention of artists like Michael Franti and Emily King, who later invited her on tour.Since then, Canal has shared stages with major acts, fronted Nike’s Jordan FlyEase campaign, and in 2024, she won the prestigious Ivor Novello Award in the UK for songwriting. Her music is known for its honesty and vulnerability, exploring themes of body image, identity, and resilience.Shocking abuse allegations revealed publiclyEarlier this month, Canal revealed in an Instagram post that early in her career she was groomed and abused by a “very powerful, decades-older man” who had offered her first professional break. She described how she was manipulated into silence by the abuser, who made her believe that no one else wanted her. Canal wrote that she was told speaking about the abuse would end her career before it had even begun, according to Music Ally.Victoria said the experience, which lasted just over a year, has had a lasting effect on her intimate life. Sharing her truth, she explained, was part of her healing journey. Although she did not name her alleged abuser, speculation online suggested it could be musician Michael Franti. ETimes cannot independently verify this.Reclaiming power through honestyFor Canal, speaking openly about abuse is part of reclaiming her power, just like her previous disclosures about body image and mental health. She shared a strong message to her fans,“Whatever you look like, whatever you are feeling, you are accepted, you are enough. You are more than enough.”DISCLAIMER: If you or someone you know is experiencing domestic violence, assault, or abuse, please seek immediate help. Reach out to a mental health specialist, NGO, or trusted individual. Several helplines are available to offer assistance."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Tom Cruise's ‘Final Reckoning’ gets OTT release date
Tom Cruise's 'Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning' is coming to digital platforms. The film will be available on August 19, 2025. It follows a 90-day theatrical release. Viewers can buy or rent it on major platforms. The movie sees Ethan Hunt stopping a dangerous AI. Despite good reviews, its box office performance was under expectations.
‘Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning’ OTT Release: Tom Cruise starrer sets August 19, 2025 for digital streaming | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmentenglishhollywood‘Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning’ OTT Release: Tom Cruise starrer sets August 19, 2025 for digital streamingTrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan Thoogudeepa‘Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning’ OTT Release: Tom Cruise starrer sets August 19, 2025 for digital streamingTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in /  Aug 18, 2025, 13:49 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeTom Cruise's 'Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning' is coming to digital platforms. The film will be available on August 19, 2025. It follows a 90-day theatrical release. Viewers can buy or rent it on major platforms. The movie sees Ethan Hunt stopping a dangerous AI. Despite good reviews, its box office performance was under expectations.  After a long 3-month wait, fans of Tom Cruise's latest action-adventure film, 'Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning' is set for its digital debut.According to the latest reports, 'The Final Reckoning', said to be the last film in the MI franchise, will make its digital debut on Tuesday, August 19, 2025. This comes after a 90-day run at the theatrical window. Screen Rant reports that the film will now be available to buy or rent on all major VOD platforms - including Apple TV, Prime Video, YouTube, and Fandango at Home. The purchase price is set at USD 19.99, while rentals will be available for around USD 14.99. For die-hard fans of the action franchise, buying the film comes with a range of exclusive bonus features that go beyond your typical digital release.Box office collectionsDespite good reviews and an extensive global promotional campaign, the film’s box office performance has raised questions about the future of the franchise. The movie reportedly has grossed an estimated $595 million worldwide. Although an impressive number for most films releasing in 2025, the numbers don't meet the mark as the film reportedly had a production budget of $400 million. The film's low box office performance has triggered speculation that it could just mark the end of the franchise. About the film'The Final Reckoning' follows Ethan Hunt and his team on a daring mission to stop Gabriel and the dangerous AI program known as The Entity, which threatens global destruction.Launched in 1996 with the first film based on the classic 1960s TV series, the 'Mission: Impossible' franchise has since grown into one of Hollywood’s most successful action sagas, producing eight films over 29 years. Sufi Motiwala confirms rift with Apoorva
Sufi Motiwala and Apoorva Mukhija's friendship, which blossomed on 'The Traitors,' has ended. Sufi revealed he cut ties because he felt Apoorva didn't address her fans' abuse towards him. He clarified he didn't use her for clout, wanting genuine friendship, not dealing with constant mistreatment without accountability.
Sufi Motiwala confirms rift with Apoorva Mukhija; says, 'I wanted to be friends with Apoorva not the rebel kid' | - The Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimesTOI GamesLive VideosCityMetro CitiesmumbaidelhibengaluruHyderabadkolkatachennaiOther CitiesCityagraagartalaahmedabadajmeramaravatiamritsarbareillybhubaneswarbhopalchandigarhchhatrapati sambhajinagarcoimbatorecuttackdehradunerodefaridabadghaziabadgoagurgaonguwahatihubballiimphalindoreitanagarjaipurjammujamshedpurjodhpurkanpurkochikohimakolhapurkozhikodeludhianalucknowmaduraimangalurumeerutmumbai regionmysurunagpurnashiknavi mumbainoidapatnaprayagrajpuducherrypuneraipurrajkotranchithanesalemshillongshimlasrinagarsurattrichythiruvananthapuramudaipurvadodaravaranasivijayawadavisakhapatnamphotosWeb StoriesIndiafeaturedOperation SindoorCancel PatriarchyMaharashtraDelhiKarnatakaTamil NaduTelanganaUttar PradeshWest BengalGujaratMadhya PradeshBiharChandigarhRajasthanArunachal PradeshAndhra PradeshAssamChhattisgarhGoaHaryanaHimachal PradeshJammu KashmirJharkhandKeralaManipurMeghalayaMizoramNagalandOdishaPunjabSikkimTripuraUttarakhandAndaman Nicobar IslandsDadra Nagar HaveliDaman DiuLakshadweepPondicherryWeb StoriesSaving Our StripesDigital ArrestWorldBusinessTechCricketSportsEntertainmentAstroTVEducationLife & StyleWeb SeriesTimes EvokePhotosBlogsNewsSufi Motiwala confirms rift with Apoorva Mukhija; says, 'I wanted to be friends with Apoorva not the rebel kid'Sufi Motiwala confirms rift with Apoorva Mukhija; says, 'I wanted to be friends with Apoorva not the rebel kid'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in /  Aug 18, 2025, 13:00 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeSufi Motiwala and Apoorva Mukhija's friendship, which blossomed on 'The Traitors,' has ended. Sufi revealed he cut ties because he felt Apoorva didn't address her fans' abuse towards him. He clarified he didn't use her for clout, wanting genuine friendship, not dealing with constant mistreatment without accountability.  With the way things unfolded during and after ‘The Traitors,’ it seemed like the entertainment industry was ready to find new BFFs in Sufi Motiwala and Arpoorva Mukhija. However, just when the audience was starting to cherish their bond, their friendship ended. Sufi Motiwala took to his social media handle to clear the air around their bond and say that he has cut ties with Apoorva. In his words, he wanted to be friends with Apoorva Mukhija and not Rebel Kid.Read on to know what Sufi Motiwala has to say on his broken bond with Apoorva MukhijaSufi Motiwala breaks his silence on his ‘not friends anymore’ status with Apoorva Mukhija“No more lies. I’ve received a lot of texts saying that I’ve taken clout from Apoorva, and I’ve left her. I’ve literally never collaborated on a reel with her and have been on her YouTube twice, both of which were her content pieces entirely," wrote Sufi before adding, “So no I’m not sorry I didn’t use her for clout (incase u forgot we were on the same show without knowing each other I don’t need her clout) I wanted to be friends with Apoorva not the rebel kid when there was no accountability constantly for how I was being treated I distanced myself."He shared that despite his request to Apoorva to make her fans understand not to slam him, he got no response from her. “I even requested her to ask her audience to calm down because they’ve been abusing me for no reason. Sadly, this person who called me her best friend has no concern for that, or the fact that maybe I’m hurt. THAT is why I’m not friends with her anymore. Keep it cute, keep it moving."“Idc about anything u think I’m a horrible person, ok. But I have worked my a** off to build myself to where I am, and I won’t let a bunch of children discredit that by spreading misinformation," he concluded.Sufi and Apoorva formed a strong friendship during the shoot of ‘The Traitors,’ which fans on the internet embraced. However, keen observers noted that the two have stopped mentioning each other on social media, despite attending the same events, including one in Australia. Reportedly, Sufi has unfollowed Apoorva on Instagram.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. We explore the intersections of entertainment with society, politics, and everyday life.Read MoreEnd of ArticleFollow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   PreviousFrom Mawsynram to Cherrapunji: India’s wettest places you must visit​travelKundali Bhagya fame Shraddha Arya’s stunning ethnic lookstvAnupama Parameswaran shines bright in striking snapsEntertainmentMalavika Mohanan's stunning style moments you can't missEntertainment9 reasons why Kolkata feels forever nostalgictravel8 must-read books for building positive habitsLifestyle​Ever heard of Flying fish? BTS gears up for 2026 comeback
Global K-pop sensation BTS is gearing up for a highly anticipated group comeback in 2026, following the members' completion of mandatory military service. HYBE confirmed the septet's return, marking a significant milestone after their 2022 hiatus.
BTS gears up for 2026 comeback; Hybe confirms return following completion of mandatory Military service | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardsNewsentertainmentBTS gears up for 2026 comeback; Hybe confirms return following completion of mandatory Military serviceTrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaBTS gears up for 2026 comeback; Hybe confirms return following completion of mandatory Military serviceKorean Desk / Updated: Aug 18, 2025, 12:29 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeGlobal K-pop sensation BTS is gearing up for a highly anticipated group comeback in 2026, following the members' completion of mandatory military service. HYBE confirmed the septet's return, marking a significant milestone after their 2022 hiatus. BTS members at LA's morning beach BTS, the global K-pop sensation, is set to return as a full group in 2026 following the completion of mandatory military service by all members. The group announced their hiatus in 2022 to fulfill national duties, with the eldest member Jin discharged in June 2024, followed by others progressively. According to statements from their agency HYBE, the comeback will mark a significant milestone, allowing the septet to resume activities together. This development comes as fans have eagerly awaited updates, with solo projects keeping the momentum during the break.Working on new album in LA Currently, the members are engaged in daily practice sessions in Los Angeles, honing their skills for the upcoming release. These sessions focus on choreography, vocal training, and new song arrangements, ensuring a polished performance. Sources close to the group indicate that this intensive preparation is taking place in a professional studio environment, blending their signature style with fresh concepts. The LA location provides a creative hub away from distractions, allowing for focused collaboration. Details on music and potential activities The 2026 comeback is expected to feature a new album with tracks that evolve from their previous works. Industry insiders suggest possible inclusions of innovative elements like advanced production techniques. While specifics remain under wraps, the group has hinted at themes of growth and unity in recent interviews. Additionally, there could be plans for concerts and fan engagements, building on their history of successful global tours, though details are yet to be confirmed.Fan expectations and group impact Fan communities, known as ARMY, are expressing high anticipation through social media discussions and fan events. This comeback is poised to reinforce BTS's influence in the music industry, where K-pop has seen consistent growth in global streams, as reported by Billboard. Objectively, past comebacks have demonstrated their ability to maintain relevance, with similar returns boosting engagement metrics"Get the latest news updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorKorean DeskKorean Desk covers news and stories from South Korea’s entertainment scene. This includes films, web series, music trends, and cultural topics shaping what audiences are watching and listening to- both locally and around the world.

The desk works as part of the Main Desk and focuses on developments that reflect Korea’s creative influence.

Writers and editors on the desk bring regional knowledge and global context. The goal is to follow what’s moving in Korean entertainment.Read MoreEnd of ArticleFollow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   PreviousSalwar tales by gorgeous lady Shabana ShajahantvCars under Rs 6 lakh with six airbags: Maruti Alto, Nissan Magnite and moreautoKundali Bhagya fame Shraddha Arya’s stunning ethnic lookstvAnupama Parameswaran shines bright in striking snapsEntertainment'Coolie' actress Reba Monica John’s picture-perfect momentsEntertainmentMalavika Mohanan's stunning style moments you can't missEntertainmentJannat Zubair’s Gen-Z Style is Pure PerfectiontvEver heard of Flying fish? Aryan’s rumoured GF Larissa calls him ‘unstoppable’
Aryan Khan's directorial debut, 'The Ba***ds Of Bollywood', has released its first look, drawing enthusiastic reactions, including high praise from rumored girlfriend Larissa Bonesi, who lauded Aryan as 'unstoppable'. Larissa has previously expressed her support for Aryan's project. The series, a dramedy set in Bollywood, features a star-studded cast and cameo appearances from major industry figures.
Aryan Khan’s rumoured girlfriend Larissa Bonesi calls him ‘unstoppable’, praises his directorial debut 'The Ba***ds Of Bollywood': 'Proud is an understatement' | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAryan Khan’s rumoured girlfriend Larissa Bonesi calls him ‘unstoppable’, praises his directorial debut 'The Ba***ds Of Bollywood': 'Proud is an understatement'TrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithSunjay KapurAnushka SharmaRajesh KhannaDarshan ThoogudeepaAryan Khan’s rumoured girlfriend Larissa Bonesi calls him ‘unstoppable’, praises his directorial debut 'The Ba***ds Of Bollywood': 'Proud is an understatement'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 18, 2025, 13:55 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeAryan Khan's directorial debut, 'The Ba***ds Of Bollywood', has released its first look, drawing enthusiastic reactions, including high praise from rumored girlfriend Larissa Bonesi, who lauded Aryan as 'unstoppable'. Larissa has previously expressed her support for Aryan's project. The series, a dramedy set in Bollywood, features a star-studded cast and cameo appearances from major industry figures.  Bollywood star Shah Rukh Khan’s son Aryan Khan is stepping into the world of Entertainment, but behind the camera. His directorial debut series, 'The Ba***ds Of Bollywood', has just dropped its first look, and the reactions are pouring in. And now Aryan’s rumoured girlfriend, Larissa Bonesi seems impressed. She didn’t hold back while praising him and his upcoming project. Larissa calls Aryan ‘unstoppable’ after teaserLarissa shared the teaser on her Instagram stories, writing, “Unstoppable, unmatched, and truly World’s #1! Proud is an understatement!” Aryan reshared her story, showing his appreciation for her support. Her message added a personal touch to the growing excitement around the series.SRK confirms cameo in 'Aryan Khan’s 'The Ba****ds of Bollywood'Earlier support proves her admirationThis isn’t the first time Larissa has shown support for Aryan’s work. In February, when Netflix officially announced the show, she shared a heartfelt note on Instagram. She wrote, “Thaaat’s fire! 'The Ba***ds of Bollywood'.” She also described the show as, “The most awaited show in the whole world. By the beast, the genius, and the number one, Aryan Khan.” Her excitement was clear, accompanied by a string of emojis celebrating Aryan’s dedication.Who is Larissa Bonesi?As reported by News18, born on 28 March 1990 in Brazil, Larissa Bonesi is a model and actress who has worked in Hindi and Telugu films. She featured as a dancer in Akshay Kumar and John Abraham’s 'Desi Boyz' song ‘Subah Hone Na De’. Larissa had a minor role in Saif Ali Khan’s 'Go Goa Gone' and appeared as the female lead in the Telugu action-comedy 'Thikka'.Aryan and Larissa’s dating rumoursFans began speculating about Aryan and Larissa’s relationship last year after noticing Aryan followed her and her mother, Renata Bonesi, on Instagram. Larissa reportedly follows the Khan family in return. The duo was also seen celebrating New Year 2025 together at a Mumbai party with other celebrities, fuelling further rumours.About 'The Ba***ds Of Bollywood''The Ba***ds Of Bollywood' is a fictional, self-aware dramedy set in the high-energy and unpredictable world of Indian cinema. Aryan Khan serves as the creator and director, working with co-creators and writers Bilal Siddiqi and Manav Chauhan.The star-studded cast includes Bobby Deol, Lakshya, Sahher Bambba, Manoj Pahwa, Mona Singh, Manish Chaudhari, Raghav Juyal, Anya Singh, Vijayant Kohli, and Gautami Kapoor. Shah Rukh Khan has a cameo appearance, and reports suggest that Ranbir Kapoor, Salman Khan, Ranveer Singh, and Karan Johar will also make special appearances."Get the latest news updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. We explore the intersections of entertainment with society, politics, and everyday life.Read MoreEnd of ArticleFollow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   Previous8 best anti-ageing ingredients you should start using in your 20sLifestyle10 best vegetarian sources of IronLifestyleSalwar tales by gorgeous lady Shabana ShajahantvCars under Rs 6 lakh with six airbags: Maruti Alto, Nissan Magnite and moreautoKundali Bhagya fame Shraddha Arya’s stunning ethnic lookstvAnupama Parameswaran shines bright in striking snapsEntertainment'Coolie' actress Reba Monica John’s picture-perfect momentsEntertainmentMalavika Mohanan's stunning style moments you can't missEntertainmentJannat Zubair’s Gen-Z Style is Pure PerfectiontvEver heard of Flying fish? Gandalf-Frodo to return in 'Hunt for Gollum'
Ian McKellen hinted at Gandalf and Frodo's potential return in 'The Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum' during a fan event in London. McKellen teased the film's production, directed by Andy Serkis, and revealed the presence of characters named Frodo and Gandalf. While Elijah Wood attended the event, McKellen remained tight-lipped about Wood reprising his role.
Ian McKellen CONFIRMS Gandalf and Frodo's return in 'The Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum': 'I'll tell you two secrets about the casting...' | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmentenglishhollywoodIan McKellen CONFIRMS Gandalf and Frodo's return in 'The Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum': 'I'll tell you two secrets about the casting...'TrendingCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithJyoti ChandekarRajesh KhannaAjay RaoSaiyaara Box Office CollectionCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithJyoti ChandekarRajesh KhannaAjay RaoSaiyaara Box Office CollectionCoolie Box Office CollectionJaved AkhtarArmaan MalikShah Rukh KhanWar 2AjithJyoti ChandekarRajesh KhannaAjay RaoSaiyaara Box Office CollectionIan McKellen CONFIRMS Gandalf and Frodo's return in 'The Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum': 'I'll tell you two secrets about the casting...'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in /  Aug 18, 2025, 11:46 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeIan McKellen hinted at Gandalf and Frodo's potential return in 'The Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum' during a fan event in London. McKellen teased the film's production, directed by Andy Serkis, and revealed the presence of characters named Frodo and Gandalf. While Elijah Wood attended the event, McKellen remained tight-lipped about Wood reprising his role.  It's time to travel back to Middle-earth once again, and this time around, we'll have some familiar faces joining this epic journey. Hollywood legend, Ian McKellen on Sunday, teased fans about the return of Gandalf and Frodo in the upcoming 'The Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum'.Gandalf and Frodo's ReturnThe revelation came during McKellen’s appearance at the For the Love of Fantasy fan event in London. In videos doing the rounds from the event, the actor took over the microphone to tease fans saying, “I hear there’s going to be another movie based in Middle-earth." Revealing production details, he added, "it's going to start filming in May. It’s going to be directed by Gollum (Andy Serkis), and it’s all about Gollum.”McKellen then went on to drop the biggest surprise of the event by saying, “I’ll tell you two secrets about the casting: There’s a character in the movie called Frodo, and there’s a character in the movie called Gandalf.” When pressed for more details, the actor quipped, “Apart from that, my lips are sealed.”LOTR Cast ReunitesThough the actor stopped short of confirming whether fellow actor Elijah Wood would reprise his role, Wood was in attendance at the event. The 'LOTR' cast also had a mini-reunion at the event, with franchise stars Sean Astin, Dominic Monaghan, Billy Boyd, and John Rhys-Davies also joining the event. About The FilmOriginally announced in 2023, the project is being directed by and starring Serkis, was initially slated for a 2026 release. However, the film is now expected to arrive in December 2027.Since concluding the original Oscar-winning trilogy in 2003 with 'The Return of the King', McKellen, Wood, and Peter Jackson reunited for 'The Hobbit' films between 2012 and 2014. If they reprise their roles in 'The Hunt for Gollum', it would mark yet another outing for the stars in the J.R.R. Tolkien-inspired franchise.The project joins a growing slate of high-profile reimaginings, including upcoming films in the Batman, Superman, and Harry Potter franchises."Get the latest news updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India.
